name.str_pl: pairs of glimmer fur boots

description: Boots lined with glimmer fur for warmth.

name.str: pair of XL glimmer fur boots
name.str_pl: pairs of XL glimmer fur boots

name.str: pair of XS glimmer fur boots
name.str_pl: pairs of XS glimmer fur boots

description: A hefty pair of fae fur-lined pants.

name.str: pair of XL glimmer fur pants
name.str_pl: pairs of XL glimmer fur pants

name.str: pair of XS glimmer fur pants
name.str_pl: pairs of XS glimmer fur pants

description: A heavy glimmer fur cloak meant to be thrown over your body.  The shimmering nature of the fur made these garments coveted before the Cataclysm.
A glimmer fur coat with a couple small pockets.  Extremely warm and very rare before the Cataclysm.
A thick glimmer fur trenchcoat, lined with pockets.  Great for storage.

//: The general guideline for sleeveless trenchcoats is the components, volume, weight, time to craft, and value are 15% lower (rounded down) than the original.  Making it from an original takes 50% the time.
description: A thick glimmer fur trenchcoat without sleeves, leaving your arms unencumbered.  Has plenty of storage space due to its many pockets.
A thick glimmer fur full-length duster.  Has many pockets for storage.  Shimmers in direct sunlight and would have been fancy clothing prior to the Cataclysm.

//: The general guideline for sleeveless dusters is the components, volume, weight, time to craft, and value are 15% lower (rounded down) than the original.  Making it from an original takes 50% the time.
description: A thick glimmer fur full-length duster without sleeves, leaving your arms unencumbered.  Has plenty of storage space due to its many pockets.
A padded greatcoat assembled by quilting gossamer and stuffing the layers with more scraps of gossamer.  It shimmers in a soft rainbow of colors.
Thick pants made of gossamer, meant to be worn alongside a gambeson under or without armor.  Stylish and as comfortable as armor can be.

A gossamer coif with neck and forehead protection.  Resting on your shoulders, it serves as padding for a helmet.  The sort of thing a fae knight guarding a crossroads would wear when challenging travelers to duels.

name.str: pair of moon tears chainmail sleeves
name.str_pl: pairs of moon tears chainmail sleeves

description: Moon tears chainmail arms, found in places where changeling bannermen are numerous.  Each sleeve has straps to connect them with each other.  The lack of fingers makes them less cumbersome and allows them to be used with gloves.

name.str: pair of XL moon tears chainmail sleeves
name.str_pl: pairs of XL moon tears chainmail sleeves

description: Moon tears chainmail arms found in places where redcap aspirants are numerous.  Each sleeve has straps to connect them with each other.  The lack of fingers makes them less cumbersome and allows them to be used with gloves.  These are oversized.

name.str: pair of XS moon tears chainmail sleeves
name.str_pl: pairs of XS moon tears chainmail sleeves

description: Moon tears chainmail arms found in places where pooka aspirants are numerous.  Each sleeve has straps to connect them with each other.  The lack of fingers makes them less cumbersome and allows them to be used with gloves.  These are undersized.

name.str: pair of moon tears chainmail chausses
name.str_pl: pairs of moon tears chainmail chausses

description: Moon tears chainmail chausses that cover the feet, like booties made of chainmail.  Found in places where changeling bannermen are numerous.

name.str: pair of XL moon tears chainmail chausses
name.str_pl: pairs of XL moon tears chainmail chausses

description: Moon tears chainmail chausses that cover the feet, like booties made of chainmail.  Found in places where redcap aspirants are numerous.

name.str_pl: pairs of XS moon tears chainmail chausses

description: Moon tears chainmail chausses that cover the feet, like booties made of chainmail.  Found in places where pooka aspirants are numerous.

name.str: pair of moon tears chainmail gloves
name.str_pl: pairs of moon tears chainmail gloves

description: Moon tears chainmail gloves that fully enclose the hand.

name.str: pair of XL moon tears chainmail gloves
name.str_pl: pairs of XL moon tears chainmail gloves

name.str: pair of XS moon tears chainmail gloves
name.str_pl: pairs of XS moon tears chainmail gloves

description: A fine moon tears chainmail hood.  Can be worn comfortably under helmets.
A fine moon tears chainmail hood.  Can be worn comfortably under helmets.  Comes in XL size.
A fine moon tears chainmail hood.  Can be worn comfortably under helmets.  Comes in XS size.

name.str_pl: pairs of moon tears chainmail leggings

description: Moon tears chainmail leggings.  Their straps keep everything in place, and the lack of toes and heels allows them to work perfectly well with footwear.

name.str_pl: pairs of XL moon tears chainmail leggings

description: Moon tears chainmail leggings for the largest of redcaps.  Their straps keep everything in place, and the lack of toes and heels allows them to work perfectly well with footwear.

name.str_pl: pairs of XS moon tears chainmail leggings

description: Moon tears chainmail leggings for the smallest of pooka.  Their straps keep everything in place, and the lack of toes and heels allows them to work perfectly well with footwear.
A fully customized high steel chainmail outfit, leaving the head uncovered.  Combine with a gambeson or other padded layer for optimal protection.
A fully customized moon tears chainmail suit.  Combine with a gambeson or other padded layer for optimal protection.
A customized moon tears chainmail vest.  It's a sleeveless piece of chainmail with small straps designed to better distribute the weight.
Manually forged ballistic plate, made to fit the common ballistic plate.  Probably not as good as steel one, but lightweight, and additionally hardened with magic.

Manually forged ballistic plate, made to fit the common ballistic plate.  Probably not as good as steel one, but lightweight, and additionally hardened with magic.  Smaller in size, and can fit a side pocket of plate carrier.

Manually forged helmet, that resemble the shape of modern army helmets.  This one protect both face and eyes, using a special forged mask, but has no visor, and not so comfortable.  The dreamdross grant it some small magical properties, but you can't control their effects.
Manually forged helmet in the that resemble the shape of modern army helmets.

Lightweight armor, forged using dreamdross.  The only reason it feels soft enough is the magic.  It also has few MOLLE-compatible strips that you can utilize.  The dreamdross grant it some minor magical properties, but you can't control their effects.

name.str_pl: pairs of dreamforged arm guards

description: Pair of arm protectors, forged entirely from dreamdross.  Instead of straps this one uses a pretty smart locking mechanism, which allows you to adjust it to your hands.  The dreamdross grants it some minor magical properties, but you can't control their effects.

name.str_pl: pairs of dreamforged boots

description: Light set of boots, forged from dreamdross.  Surprisingly comfortable for clothing that has no physical padding.  The dreamdross grants it some minor magical properties, but you can't control their effects.
Thin, smooth helmet, that cover your head, with a wide, sharp two-teeth blade from the forehead.  Fueled by damage of berserk knuckles, your feel the helmet pump the tension right into your veins.

name.str_pl: pairs of dreamforged berserk guards

description: Pair of fiery red armguards, they glow red the more damage you deal, using berserk knuckles, and your physical strength grows respectively.

name.str_pl: pairs of berserker boots

description: Pair of fiery red boots, they are fueled by damage you deal with berserk knuckles, and increase your speed respectively.

Dreamforged helmet with side protection, and carved runes outside.  It grant you an ability to understand more, and with better world investigation your mana regeneration grows.  Runes are just decorations actually.

Pair of flat armguards, fully carved with numbers and crosses.  Inside the left guard there is a text, cut with something sharp, that starts from "Sent onto those that escaped limbo's clutches, and unleash the rage of all hell…".
A helmet made from the of living plant matter, with bark covering the outer surface.  This is definitely not anything that could have existed before the Cataclysm.

//2: The idea for this is that it's basically plate-and-mail, but with bark and a kind of mossy, viney connective tissue

name.str_pl: verdant cuirasses

description: A cuirass made of living plant matter, with bark covering the outer surface.  This is definitely not anything that could have existed before the Cataclysm.

name.str_pl: pairs of verdant gauntlets

description: A pair of fingerless gauntlets made from living plant matter, with bark covering the outer surface.  This is definitely not anything that could have existed before the Cataclysm.

name.str_pl: pairs of verdant boots

description: Boots made from living plant matter, with bark covering the outer surface.  This is definitely not anything that could have existed before the Cataclysm.
